entry.title: 3 Minute Zen Aromatic Scrub Solids
entry.summary:
Vendor: Geti Cosmetics
Type: Shower Melts
Price: 7.00 - 14.00 (5 variants)

Easy & Convenient is the name of the game for 3-Minute Zen. Exfoliate dead skin & smooth away rough patches with this travel-friendly, drain-friendly mix of aromatherapy & skin-loving exfoliants. These scrub solids are Vegan, cruelty free and made from all natural ingredients. Available in smell proof bags of 3 or 10.

How to use

Each solid is single-use. Gently scrub dead skin away and smooth rough patches from wet skin.

For use on the face & sensitive skin, crumble solid in your hands before scrubbing into skin.

Ingredients

Sodium Bicarbonate, Magnesium Sulfate, Filtered Water, Essential Oils

entry.title: Lavender Artisan Soap Bar
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sōmi Hand-Crafted Body Care
Type: Soap
Price: 10.00

Our lavender soap bars are amazing for your skin! They are made with all-natural ingredients and leave your skin feeling extremely moisturized, nourished, and soft!

We are dedicated to providing eco-friendly products and are passionate about sustainability so we hope you enjoy these zero-waste face and body soaps!

Features + Benefits

  • All of our Soap Bars are handmade. Colour and shape may vary.
  • Soap Bars have an average size of 100 grams/ 3.5 oz.
  • All bars are vegan and never tested on animals

Ingredients

Coconut Oil, Castor Oil, Olive Oil, Shea Butter, Canola Oil, Lavender Powder, Chamomile Powder, Lavender Essential Oil, Vitamin E

entry.title: Pumpkin Blueberry Body Exfoliant
entry.summary:
Vendor: Earthnotes Skincare
Type: Exfoliator
Price: 13.00

Imagine your skin is experiencing dryness and flaking, which let's face it, is not the level of health and cute you deserve. Now imagine reaching for that body scrub you have in the shower and massaging it into your skin. Is it doing anything? Have you ever found yourself asking, is this actually doing anything? That's why you need Earthnotes Skincare's body exfoliant. Whether you are treating dry skin, prepping your skin for shaving or just want to help renew you skin, you deserve to feel like your product is working for you (without feeling like you've lost a layer or two of skin, because nobody really wants that, even if you say you do).

Features + Benefits

  • Leaves skin more nourished
  • Are highly moisturizing
  • Are made with quality essential oils
  • Contain natural ingredients
  • Is a medium grit exfoliant
  • Are made with vegan certified ingredients
  • Paraben Free
  • Phthalate Free
  • Cruelty Free
  • Leaves skin visibly smoother and softer
  • 8oz

Ingredients

Raw Cane Sugar, Prunus dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Cocos nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Ricinus communis (Castor) Oil, Prunus armeniaca (Apricot) Oil, Vitis vinifera (Grapeseed) Oil, Punica granatum (Pomegranate) Oil, Simmondsia chinensis (Jojoba) Oil, Hamamelis virginiana (Witch Hazel), Glycerine, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice (Aloe Vera), D-Alpha-Tocopherol (Vitamine E), Frangrance oil.

entry.title: Sex on the Beach Shower Gel
entry.summary:
Vendor: Earthnotes Skincare
Type: Shower Gel
Price: 5.00

This shower gel celebrates one of the most popular summer cocktails out there, the sex on the beach. Beautiful to look at with its blend of bright yellows and oranges and infused with the sweet flavours of coconut, pineapple, honeydew and a fresh splash of cranberry.

Product Information

  • Botanical soap formula
  • SLS Free formula
  • Paraben Free
  • Phthalate Free
  • Cruelty Free
  • Moisturizing formula
  • Made with vegan certified ingredients
  • Bottle is recyclable
  • Please use within 12 months of opening

Ingredients

Aqua, Cocamidopropyl hydrozysultaine, Cocamidopropyl betaine, Decyl glucoside, DL Panthernol, Hydrolyzed soy protein, PEG-150, Pentaerythrityl tetrastearate, Phenoxyethanol, Polyquaternium-7, Rosemary extract, Citric acid, PEG-7 glyveryl cocoate, Hamamelis virginiana (witch hazel), Vitis vinifera (grapeseed) oil, Prunus armenica (apricot) oil, Simmondsia chinensis (jojoba) oil, Fragrance oil.

entry.title: Oatmeal Shea Olive Oil Soap Bar
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mifa & Co.
Type: Soap
Price: 12.00

Nourish-Exfoliate-Rejuvenate

Available in 3.5 oz / 100 g (approx. wt.)

MIFA’s 100% natural olive oil soap, OATMEAL SHEA, is made with luxurious 100% certified organic ingredients to nourish, exfoliate, and rejuvenate your skin.

We paired this soap with oatmeal, making this soap ideal for anyone wanting a light exfoliating bar. It helps remove dead skin cells, leaving your skin feeling soothed and moisturized. 

As an unscented bar rich in vitamin E - it doesn’t contain any essential oils making it safe for anyone with sensitive skin. 

Key Ingredients

Shea Butter - An emollient, rich in essential fatty acids. It is a humectant, helping the skin retain moisture and deeply hydrate to the skin.

Oatmeal - Exfoliates and removes dead skin cells and it is one of the most common and most effective soothing powders used in the skincare products having various calming properties.

Coconut - This fruit's beneficial oil provides moisture to hair and skin, safely, gently and effectively removes excess oil and dirt from skin and hair without depleting necessary nutrients and moisture.

Olive Oil - Used for centuries in traditional soap making. It can deeply moisturize and help soften your skin. 

Full Ingredients List

Olea Europaea (Olive) Oil*, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut/Noix de Coco) Oil*, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter/Beurre de Karité) Fruit*, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa/Cacao) Seed Butter*, Avena Sativa (Oat Kernel Grinds/Avoine)*, Ricinus Communis (Castor Seed/Grain de Ricin) Oil*

*CERTIFIED ORGANIC INGREDIENTS/ Ingrédients Certifiés Organiques

Recommended Use

Apply to moistened skin. Rinse thoroughly.

The bar buffer method, is where you rub the bar directly on your skin to create lather and wash. This is definitely the best way to use exfoliating soaps and will also help get 100% maximum moisturizing effects.

Note: As with any oatmeal soap, the oats will feel more gentle with every use as the flakes become moist and soft. 

Product Information

Cruelty-Free, Toxin-Free, Sulfate-Free, Paraben-Free, Gluten-Free, Soy-Free, Phthalate-Free, Fragrance-Free, Palm Oil-Free, Vegan.

entry.title: Eucalyptus Coco Body Wash
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mifa & Co.
Type: Body Wash
Price: 10.00 - 35.00 (2 variants)

Moisturize-Purify-Relax

MIFA’s 100% natural body wash, EUCALYPTUS COCO, is made with the highest quality organic ingredients to create a rich and luxurious lather. With intoxicating notes of eucalyptus, lavender, geranium and peppermint. 

Formulated with what skin loves: botanical oils and emollient-rich tropical plant butters for a deep moisturization, combined with highly concentrated essential oils for aromatherapeutic affects both internally and externally.

As an all-over wash to cleanse, purify, and revitalize skin, it’s one of the most nourishing and cleanest formulas you can treat your body to. 

You can bring the purifying feeling of the spa to your shower. 

MIFA's EUCALYPTUS COCO named Made in Vancouver awards top 3 finalist with honourable mention by Vancouver Magazine.

"revitalizing wash will transform your bathroom into a luxe, multiple-diffuser-equipped spa" - Vancouver Magazine, July 2019

Key Ingredients

Avocado – Extracted from avocado trees, it's a great source of Vitamin A, D, E and fatty acids. Used to hydrate and soothe the skin. 

Aloe Vera – Known all over the world for its healing properties. A type of protein that contains 18 of the 20 amino acids found in the body and full of Vitamin A, B, C, and E. It restores and provides nutrition to the skin.

Coconut - This fruit's beneficial oil provides moisture to hair and skin and an extract, coco betaines, safely, gently and effectively removes excess oil and dirt from skin and hair without depleting necessary nutrients and moisture.

Cocoa Butter - An emollient, rich in essential fatty acids. Hydrates, nourishes, and improves skin elasticity.

Eucalyptus - Best known for its refreshing scent. It is a miracle plant that boosts mental clarity, while the healing properties will stimulate your immune system. An essential oil with antibacterial and anti-fungal properties. 

Lavender – Prized around the world since ancient times, the smoky, herbal scent of this flowering plant calms the mind and soothes the senses. 

Full Ingredients List

Coconut (Cocos Nucifera) Oil*, Purified Water (Aqua), Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe) Leaf Juice*, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter*, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract*, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Oil*, Pelargonium Graveolens (Geranium) Oil*, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil*, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil* 

*CERTIFIED ORGANIC INGREDIENTS/ Ingrédients Certifiés Organiques

Recommended Use

Pump body wash into your palm, and then work it into a lather in your hands. Massage over your wet skin (taking time to inhale and experience the essential oil blend) and then rinse.

 Product Information

Cruelty-Free, Toxin-Free, Sulfate-Free, Paraben-Free, Gluten-Free, Soy-Free, Phthalate-Free, Fragrance-Free, Palm Oil-Free, Vegan.

entry.title: Seductive Sandalwood Body Wash
entry.summary:
Vendor: BASD Body Care
Type: Body Lotion
Price: 12.00

This plant-basd body wash will leave your skin feeling so good, you’ll want to get dirty again. pairing the warm and woody scent of sandalwood with the benefits of natural ingredients, like organic aloe vera juice and organic green tea, means you’ll feel smooth, sexy and sophisticated all day. a long shower with a soapy sandalwood rubdown is the perfect antidote to pretty much anything life throws at you.

15.2 fl. oz / 450 ml

Features + Benefits

  • made with organic aloe vera juice to moisture and tone your skin, this wash also has a calming effect on your body, reducing red marks from acne, scarring and stretch marks
  • the essential oils help to awaken your senses and stimulate your mind
  • made with organic green tea, to provide the proven benefits of caffeine 

Ingredients

*aloe barbadensis leaf juice, sodium cooc-sulfate, decyl glucoside, parfum (blend of essential oils and naturally derived fragrances), glycol distearate, hydroxyethylcellulose, phenylpropanol, caprylyl glycol, glycerin, sodium citrate, citric acid, ethylhexylglycerin, tocopherol, glycine soja (soybean) oil, panthenol, *camellia sinensis leaf extract, allantoin
*organic ingredient

**ingredients subject to change but they will always score a perfect 0 on think dirty

How to use

get it on: get nakd. get wet. lather and rub. rinse.

Product Information

  • Made with organic ingredients
  • Tested only on consenting adults
  • Made without parabens
  • Leaping Bunny Certified

entry.title: Indulgent Crème Brûlée Coffee Body Scrub
entry.summary:
Vendor: BASD Body Care
Type: Exfoliator
Price: 15.00

Go ahead. strip down and get dirty. the mess is worth it! this natural, organic, coffee-basd exfoliator is rich in vitamins and natural oils to leave you feeling smooth and soft. chockfull of antioxidants, this scrub will ensure you're more than ready to take on your day (and the world, let's be honest). plus, the sweet scent is subtle and sexy.

Features + Benefits

  • made from organic coffee! caffeine helps to create microcirculation to target acne, scarring, stretch marks and cellulite (yup, coffee can do that!). plus, grounds are fine enough to act as an incredible exfoliant
  • sea salt and coconut sugar help to further wash away dead skin cells and reduce the appearance of puffiness
  • organic sweet almond oil provides your skin with rich hydration, to leave it glowing and healthy

Ingredients

*coffee arabica seed powder (ground coffee), *prunus amygdalus sativa kernel oil (sweet almond oil), water/eau, sea salt, *sucrose (coconut sugar), tocopherol, *citrus sinensis peel oil (orange), fragrance (blend of essential oils and naturally derived fragrances) *organic ingredient

How to use

get nakd. get wet. in the shower dirty up with a small handful of basd. rub in a circular motion to feel exhilarated as you exfoliate. repeat as required. rinse and use basd body wash for a clean, silky finish.

need more exhilaration? invite a friend over to feel the indulgence of creme brulee or leave on the skin for 5 minutes and then rinse.

it might smell delicious, but don't put it in your mouth. also, leave it out of your eyes. they will thank you for not scrubbing them.

Product Information

  • Made with organic ingredients
  • Tested only on consenting adults
  • Made without parabens
  • Leaping Bunny Certified

it might smell delicious, but don't put it in your mouth. also, leave it out of your eyes. they will thank you for not scrubbing them.
